{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05329v1", "title": "Explicit sumset sizes in additive number theory", "summary": "In the study of sums of finite sets of integers, most attention has been paid
to sets with small sumsets (Freiman's theorem and related work) and to sets
with large sumsets (Sidon sets and $B_h$-sets). This paper focuses on the set
$\mathcal{R}_{\mathbf{Z}}(h,k)$ of all sizes of $h$-fold sums of a set of $k$
integers and the explicit computation of elements of the set
$\mathcal{R}_{\mathbf{Z}}(h,k)$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-08T15:21:29Z"}
